body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Gray and the customer's name is Michelle Sanders.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Gerald Gray. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Gerald. I'm Michelle Sanders. I'm just looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Michelle! We have a fantastic selection of motorcycles. What specific information are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not sure yet, but I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed by all the choices.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. Choosing a motorcycle can be challenging with so many options available. May I ask how long have you been riding?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been riding for about three years now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's awesome, three years is a great amount of experience! And may I also have your zip code to assist you better with our location services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s nine zero four one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Now, can you provide me with your email address as well? This way, I can send you some personalized recommendations.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I will send you some options that fit your style and experience level. Thank you for your time today, Michelle, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
